nodes.text: The Er'Kit were a species of humanoids with large, elongated craniums. Some Er'Kit, such as the Podracer pilot Ody Mandrell, hailed from the planet of Tatooine, located in the Outer Rim Territories. Mandrell also exhibited blue skin and yellow eyes, and he stood at 1.63 meters. Danry Ledwellow was an Er'Kit senator who represented the planet Er'Kit. After a complication with Thalassian slavers, Ledwellow was arrested, and his private army of IG-227 Hailfire-class droid tanks fell into the hands of the Blood Dawn slavers.
